original_text: So you must go to people in every country of the world. Teach them how to become my disciples. Baptize them by the authority of God the Father, his Son and the Holy Spirit.
korean_text: 그러므로 너희는 가서 모든 민족을 제자로 삼아 아버지와 아들과 성령의 이름으로 세례를 베풀고

sentences.original_text: So you must go to people
in every country of the world
Teach them how to become my disciples
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 내 제자가 되는 방법을 가르쳐라

sentences.original_text: Baptize them by the authority of God the Father
his Son and the Holy Spirit
